        ma - - first matrix you want to add.
        mb - - second matrix you want to add too.

      • matrixSubtract

                                  Matrix mb,
                                  Matrix mc)
        subtracts 2 matrices ma and mb from each other and stores the result in mc.
        Parameters:
        ma - - first matrix you want to subtract.
        mb - - matrix you want to subtract the first one from.
        mc - - matrix to store the result.

      • matrixMultiply

        Parameters:
        ma - - first matrix to multiply.
        mb - - second matrix you want to multiply.
        mc - - result of multiplied matrices.
